Reference

All functions

dc

Interacted data with covariates

dnc

Judge data without covariates

GenData_cov()

Generate Data with Covariates and Binary Endogenous Regressor

GenData_nocov()

Generate Data for Grouped Instrument Model (No Covariates)

GetCIcoef()

Compute Quadratic Coefficients for Confidence Sets (Grouped Data)

GetCIcoef_iloop()

Compute Quadratic Coefficients for CI (General Design)

GetCIcoef_iloop_nocov()

Compute Quadratic Coefficients for CI (No Covariates, General P)

GetCIcoef_nocov()

Compute Quadratic Coefficients for CI (No Covariates)

GetCItypebd()

Classify and Compute Confidence Interval Bounds

GetCIvals()

Compute Quadratic Roots for Confidence Sets

GetGP()

Construct UJIVE Weighting and Projection Matrices

Getgroupindex()

Generate Integer Group Indices

GetL3OCIcoef_fast()

Compute Quadratic Coefficients for CI (Stratified Asymmetric)

GetLM()

Compute UJIVE Signal Component (Stratified Design)

GetLM_nocov()

Compute UJIVE Signal Component (No Covariates)

GetLM_WQ()

Compute UJIVE Signal Component (General Design)

GetSigMx()

Compute Covariance Matrix of UJIVE Quadratic Forms

L3Ovar_gloop_cov()

Compute L3O Variance for Score Statistic (Grouped Design)

L3Ovar_gloop_nocov()

Compute L3O Variance for Score Statistic (Grouped Design, No Covariates)

L3Ovar_iloop_cov()

Leave-Three-Out Variance Estimator for LM Statistic

L3Ovar_iloop_nocov()

Compute L3O Variance for Score Statistic (No Covariates, General Symmetric P)
